languages.text: Явившись на Даргонус, он немедленно собрал все свое семейство за столом для праздника. Вино на том пиру было столь же отравлено, как и разум самого Абеляра был отравлен безумием. С той поры почтенный сенешаль не покидал праздничный зал, готовый бесконечно любоваться своим любимым семейством, которое уже никто не в силах был у него отобрать. "Никто больше вам не навредит" — повторял он, умиленно прикладывая распухшие руки к покрытым язвами губам, и мертвецы слабым хрипом согласно вторили ему.

Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.
languages.original_text: Явившись на Даргонус, он немедленно собрал все свое семейство за столом для праздника. Вино на том пиру было столь же отравлено, как и разум самого Абеляра был отравлен безумием. С той поры почтенный сенешаль не покидал праздничный зал, готовый бесконечно любоваться своим любимым семейством, которое уже никто не в силах был у него отобрать. "Никто больше вам не навредит" — повторял он, умиленно прикладывая распухшие руки к покрытым язвами губам, и мертвецы слабым хрипом согласно вторили ему.

traits.locale_text: After arriving on Dargonus, he immediately started to assemble all of his family for a celebratory dinner. The vine on that feast was as poisoned, as Abelard's mind was poisoned with madness. From this moment honourable Seneschal never left the festive hall, ready to look over his favourite family forever. No one was able to ever take them from him. "No one will harm you anymore," he stuttered, repeating the words, and touching ulcer-ridden lips with his swollen hands, and the dead faintly echoed him.

From this moment honourable Seneschal never left the festive hall, ready to look over his favourite family forever. No one was able to ever take them from him. "No one will harm you anymore," he stuttered, repeating the words, and touching ulcer-ridden lips with his swollen hands, and the dead faintly echoed him.

The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. languages.text: 回到达戈努斯之后，他立即召集他的家人举行庆祝晚宴。然而，宴会上的美酒却充斥着致命的剧毒，正如阿贝拉德的心灵一样。尊敬的总领再也不必离开这个礼堂了，他将会就在这里，永远照看他心爱的家人。从此往后，再也没人能从他手里夺走他们了。“再也没有人能伤害你们了。”他一边用肿胀的双手抚摸着溃烂的嘴唇，一边像念邪咒一样，不断喃喃自语着这句话。死者的声音隐隐地附和着他。
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: 回到达戈努斯之后，他立即召集他的家人举行庆祝晚宴。然而，宴会上的美酒却充斥着致命的剧毒，正如阿贝拉德的心灵一样。尊敬的总领再也不必离开这个礼堂了，他将会就在这里，永远照看他心爱的家人。从此往后，再也没人能从他手里夺走他们了。“再也没有人能伤害你们了。”他一边用肿胀的双手抚摸着溃烂的嘴唇，一边像念邪咒一样，不断喃喃自语着这句话。死者的声音隐隐地附和着他。

languages.text: Nach seiner Ankunft auf Dargonus versammelte er sofort seine Familie zu einer großen Feier. Der Wein bei dem festlichen Essen war ebenso vergiftet wie Abelards eigener Verstand. Der ehrenwerte Truchsess würde den Festsaal nie wieder verlassen müssen. Er war dazu bestimmt, für immer über seine geliebte Familie zu wachen. Niemand würde sie ihm je wieder wegnehmen. "Jetzt kann Euch niemand mehr wehtun", murmelte er. Er wiederholte die Worte wie ein perverses Mantra, während er sich mit geschwollenen Händen über die Blasen auf den Lippen strich. Die Toten antworteten nicht.
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: Nach seiner Ankunft auf Dargonus versammelte er sofort seine Familie zu einer großen Feier. Der Wein bei dem festlichen Essen war ebenso vergiftet wie Abelards eigener Verstand. Der ehrenwerte Truchsess würde den Festsaal nie wieder verlassen müssen. Er war dazu bestimmt, für immer über seine geliebte Familie zu wachen. Niemand würde sie ihm je wieder wegnehmen. "Jetzt kann Euch niemand mehr wehtun", murmelte er. Er wiederholte die Worte wie ein perverses Mantra, während er sich mit geschwollenen Händen über die Blasen auf den Lippen strich. Die Toten antworteten nicht.

languages.text: En arrivant sur Dargonus, il réunit immédiatement sa famille pour un dîner de célébration. Le vin qui fut servi pendant le festin était aussi empoisonné que l'esprit d'Abélard. L'honorable sénéchal ne quitta plus jamais la salle de fête, destiné à veiller pour toujours sur sa famille adorée. Rien ne pourrait plus les séparer. « Vous n'avez plus rien à craindre, » répétait-il comme un mantra tout en caressant ses lèvres couvertes d'ulcères de ses doigts enflés, et un faible gémissement s'élevait des morts comme pour lui répondre.
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: En arrivant sur Dargonus, il réunit immédiatement sa famille pour un dîner de célébration. Le vin qui fut servi pendant le festin était aussi empoisonné que l'esprit d'Abélard. L'honorable sénéchal ne quitta plus jamais la salle de fête, destiné à veiller pour toujours sur sa famille adorée. Rien ne pourrait plus les séparer. « Vous n’avez plus rien à craindre, » répétait-il comme un mantra tout en caressant ses lèvres couvertes d'ulcères de ses doigts enflés, et un faible gémissement s’élevait des morts comme pour lui répondre.

languages.text: Nada más llegar a Dargonus, reunió de inmediato a su familia para una cena de celebración. El vino del festín estaba tan envenenado como la mente del propio Abelard. El honorable Senescal ya nunca tendría que abandonar aquel salón, destinado a cuidar de su amada familia para siempre. Ya nadie iba a arrebatárselos. «Ahora nadie puede haceros daño», murmuraba una y otra vez en un mantra enfermizo mientras se acariciaba los labios cubiertos de úlceras con sus manos hinchadas, y los muertos repetían débilmente sus palabras.
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: Nada más llegar a Dargonus, reunió de inmediato a su familia para una cena de celebración. El vino del festín estaba tan envenenado como la mente del propio Abelard. El honorable Senescal ya nunca tendría que abandonar aquel salón, destinado a cuidar de su amada familia para siempre. Ya nadie iba a arrebatárselos. «Ahora nadie puede haceros daño», murmuraba una y otra vez en un mantra enfermizo mientras se acariciaba los labios cubiertos de úlceras con sus manos hinchadas, y los muertos repetían débilmente sus palabras.

languages.text: ダルゴナスに到着すると、彼はすぐに家族を集めて祝宴を開いた。その晩餐会のワインは、アベラルド自身の心と同じように毒されていた。名誉ある家令長はもう二度と祝宴の場を離れることはなく、永遠に愛する家族を見守る運命にあった。「もう誰もあなたを傷つけることはできない」と彼は呟き、腫れた手で潰瘍だらけの唇を撫でながら、病んだマントラのようにその言葉を繰り返した。
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスに到着すると、彼はすぐに家族を集めて祝宴を開いた。その晩餐会のワインは、アベラルド自身の心と同じように毒されていた。名誉ある家令長はもう二度と祝宴の場を離れることはなく、永遠に愛する家族を見守る運命にあった。「もう誰もあなたを傷つけることはできない」と彼は呟き、腫れた手で潰瘍だらけの唇を撫でながら、病んだマントラのようにその言葉を繰り返した。

languages.text: Dargonus'a ulaşır ulaşmaz bir kutlama yemeğiyle ailesini topladı. Ziyafette servis edilen şarap da Abelard'ın zihni gibi zehirliydi. Onurlu Seneşal; ziyafet salonundan asla ayrılmak zorunda kalmayacak, değerli ailesini sonsuza dek izleyebilecekti. Artık kimse onları ondan alamayacaktı. Ülser kaplı dudaklarını kabarmış elleriyle okşarken "Artık kimse size zarar veremez." diye mırıldanıyor, kelimeleri hastalıklı bir düstur gibi sürekli tekrar ediyordu. Sözleri, ölülerde hafifçe yankı buluyordu.
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus'a ulaşır ulaşmaz bir kutlama yemeğinde ailesini bir araya getirdi. Tıpkı Abelard'ın zihni gibi, ziyafet sırasında servis edilen şarap da zehirliydi. Onurlu Seneşal bir daha ziyafet salonunu terk etmek zorunda kalmayacak, değerli ailesini sonsuza kadar izleyebilecekti. Artık kimse onları ondan alamayacaktı. Ülser kaplı dudaklarını, kabarmış elleriyle okşarken "artık kimse size zarar veremez" diye mırıldanıyor, kelimeleri hastalıklı bir düstur gibi sürekli tekrar ediyordu. Sözcükleri, ölülerde hafifçe yankı buluyordu.
